    Enclosing class:
    UiWidgetAdapterGwtRichTextField

    public static class UiWidgetAdapterGwtRichTextField.MyRichTextArea
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.RichTextArea
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasValue<String>, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasChangeHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.FocusHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.BlurHandler
    This inner class makes RichTextArea implement HasValue.
